newsitem.title: USA: Clinton enjoys White House hot tub.
newsitem.headline: Clinton enjoys White House hot tub.

text.p: U.S. President Bill Clinton is up to his neck in hot water and enjoying every minute of it, now that a new hot tub has been donated to the White House.
A California firm provided a tub which can hold up to seven people to the National Parks Service, which installed it at the White House by the swimming pool near the West Wing.
"The president reports that it's nice," White House spokesman Mike McCurry said on Friday.

Asked why Clinton opted for a seven-seater when there are only three members of his immediate family, McCurry said it was chosen to deal with the needs of "future presidents" -- adding that Vice President Al Gore and his wife have four children.
